attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister sir and the Government,
Please listen to your public, see the vast comments on the BBC news website, and stop this insane destruction of Cadburys. It is one of the last British institutions remaining, and should be preserved. We all grew up with Cadbury and love it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
